entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is described as someone who sank back into the silver mass below and vanished.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as someone who was staring at the Pensieve, completely lost in thought.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who spoke to Dumbledore and seemed to be affected by what Dumbledore said.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as a creature that had fallen silent.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as someone who was defeated by the person Dumbledore spoke of.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is described as something that Dumbledore was staring at.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentioned Harry as the person who had a chance of conquering Lord Voldemort.
Dumbledore spoke of someone who would defeat Lord Voldemort.
